definition: to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)
to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research

sentences.english: Objective To study and develop treatment planning system of intensity modulated radiotherapy(IMRT).
sentences.chinese: 目的研制开发调强放射治疗逆向计划系统。

sentences.english: Frequent X-rays or radiation treatments to the head.
sentences.chinese: 头部频繁的X线检查或放射治疗。

sentences.english: Surgery and radiotherapy should be combined .
sentences.chinese: 手术和放射治疗必须相结合。

sentences.english: Objective To assess the value of Gamma knife combined with whole brain radiation therapy for brain metastases.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价脑转移瘤伽玛刀联合全脑放射治疗的价值。

sentences.english: The patient was treated with surgery and adjuvant radiotherapy followed by systemic chemotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 于肿瘤摘除术后辅以放射治疗及化学治疗。

sentences.english: Patients who responded to chemotherapy received radiotherapy with or without additional chemotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 对化疗有反应的患者行放射治疗加或不加辅助化疗。
质子放射治疗往往超过10万美元。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the value of X-ray Knife in the stereotaxis radiotherapy of lung cancer.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨X刀立体定向在放射治疗肺癌中的价值。

sentences.english: Proctitis is common in patients undergoing pelvic radiation therapy .
sentences.chinese: 直肠炎常见于骨盆放射治疗的病人。

sentences.english: Sheet radiates with thymus cure cannot alleviate anaemic .
sentences.chinese: 单用胸腺放射治疗不能缓解贫血。

sentences.english: Current advances of gene-therapy combined with radiotherapy for malignant glioma have been reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 简述恶性脑肿瘤基因治疗，联合放射治疗的现状。

sentences.english: The patient underwent a full course of concurrent chemoradiotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 患者接受了一完整的合并化学放射治疗。

sentences.english: Or every radiation treatment gets 15minutes of guided imagery.
sentences.chinese: 或每个放射治疗获得15分钟引导图像。

sentences.english: Radiosensitizers are drugs that make tumor cells more sensitive to radiation therapy.
sentences.chinese: 放射增敏剂是使肿瘤细胞对放射治疗更加敏感的药物。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the therapeutic effects of X ray stereotactic radiotherapy on brain metastases.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价X线立体定向放射治疗对脑转移瘤的疗效。

sentences.english: System error is an unignorable problem in the radiotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 在放射治疗过程中，系统误差是不可忽视的问题。

definition: biopsy/abbr. for 活體組織檢查|活体组织检查[huo2 ti3 zu3 zhi1 jian3 cha2]
